verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Has there come to you the news of the overwhelming?
verse.verse_2: Faces on that Day will be shamed.
verse.verse_5: Given to drink from a flaming spring.
verse.verse_6: They will have no food except thorns.
verse.verse_7: That neither nourishes, nor satisfies hunger.
verse.verse_8: Faces on that Day will be joyful.
verse.verse_11: In it you will hear no nonsense.
verse.verse_12: In it is a flowing spring.
verse.verse_17: Do they not look at the camels-how they are created?
verse.verse_18: And at the sky-how it is raised?
verse.verse_19: And at the mountains-how they are installed?
verse.verse_20: And at the earth-how it is spread out?
verse.verse_21: So remind. You are only a reminder.
verse.verse_22: You have no control over them.
verse.verse_23: But whoever turns away and disbelieves.
verse.verse_24: God will punish him with the greatest punishment.
verse.verse_26: Then upon Us rests their reckoning.
